item.title: Thoughts when learning Rust
item.description: These two days I have been learning Rust. Unlike Javascript, I would love to learn Rust more throughly since multiple of our projects uses Rust and we are also planning to migrate to Rust for coreos-assembler so it might be very helpful to have good fundamentals. Here is a summary of unique feature that Rust has comparing to C, Java, Python and Haskell, to which Rust somewhat resembles in some way:
